players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "I find it unfortunate that we've lost Diana so early in the game. Let us all remain vigilant and work together to identify the mafia among us."
Charlie: "I'm saddened by Diana's untimely demise. Let us all be cautious and try to identify the mafia among us."
Bob: "Charlie is the mafia, I've investigated him and have proof. We should lynch him immediately."
You: "Let's not jump to conclusions, we don't have enough information yet. We should investigate further and see if there is any evidence that can confirm Bob's claim."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob
